mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REPORT REP JOIN MEMBER M ON (REP.USERNO = M.USERNO) JOIN REVIEW R ON (REP.RNO=R.RNO) WHERE R.RSTATUS IN ('R','N') ORDER BY REP.REF_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM REPORT
WHERE REF_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%')
ORDER BY REF_DATE DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REPORT WHERE USERNO = #{userNo} and RNO = #{rno}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RSTATUS = 'N' WHERE RNO = #{rno}
